extensionDescription.message: Automatically dismisses the 'Ad Blockers are Not Allowed on YouTube' message to keep videos playing smoothly.

noRangeValueMsg.message: Enter a value between 5 and 60 seconds

defaultMsg.message: If the value is too low, the extension might not work properly. You can also enter 0 to never disable monitoring
